page.description: Returns a crlf delimited string of files in a set. Options "d" - include Dictionary, "x" - include Indexes
page.syntax: File_List as C = files_in_set(C setname [,C options ])

argument.name: setname
argument.description: The name of a set. The file extension ".set" is assumed.

argument.name: options
argument.description: Optional argument with the following possible values:

page.discussion: FILES_IN_SET() returns a CR-LF delimited character string list containing the fully qualified names of the components of the set.
page.example: dim cs as C cs = files_in_set("invoice") cs -> c:\databases\alphasports official\invoice.set c:\databases\alphasports official\invoice.sem c:\databases\alphasports official\invoice.sex c:\databases\alphasports official\invoice_header.dbf c:\databases\alphasports official\customer.dbf c:\databases\alphasports official\customer.fpt c:\databases\alphasports official\invoice_items.dbf c:\databases\alphasports official\product.dbf c:\databases\alphasports official\vendor.dbf
